long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the lush greenery of Viridian Forest with Pikachu as your guide in this enchanting start page theme! Each new tab immerses you in the tranquil, vibrant setting of one of the most iconic locations in the Pokémon world, with Pikachu exploring the dense forest under a canopy of towering trees. Perfect for Pokémon fans, this theme captures the essence of adventure and discovery, bringing the charm of Pikachu and the natural beauty of Viridian Forest to your browsing experience. Whether you're reminiscing about classic Pokémon journeys or just love the playful spirit of Pikachu, this theme adds a touch of nostalgia and wonder to every new tab.
This extension allows you to chose your search engine.
